fabrics

Class AbstractFabric<T extends DatabaseItem>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fabrics.AbstractFabric<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A DatabaseItem that the Fabric will manage.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDiscountFabric, CategoryFabric, CityFabric, CustomerFabric, FlightFabric, HotelFabric, HotelRoomFabric, ReservationFabric

    public abstract class AbstractFabric<T extends DatabaseItem>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a general Fabric. It is parameterized with the DatabaseItem that it is going to manage. It has an internal buffer system such as DatabaseItem are retrieved from the Database once and stored in a WeakHashMap.
    Author:
    Gaston Lemaire

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(T item)
      This method deletes an item from the Database and removes it from its internal buffer.
      java.util.List<T> getAll() 
      T getById(int id)
      This method gets a DatabaseItem from its buffer and queries the Database with its id if not found.

    • Method Detail

      • getById

        public T getById(int id)
        This method gets a DatabaseItem from its buffer and queries the Database with its id if not found. It uses PreparedStatement and generates the query automatically.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the DatabaseItem.
        Returns:
        The object representation of the DatabaseItem.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<T> getAll()

      • delete

        public void delete(T item)
        This method deletes an item from the Database and removes it from its internal buffer. It uses PreparedStatement and generates the query automatically.
        Parameters:
        item - The DatabaseItem to delete.
